subject: p14608347
Findings: The heart size is top normal. The hilar and mediastinal contours are within normal limits. There is no pneumothorax, focal consolidation, or pleural effusion. A round well-circumscribed left retrocardiac opacity corresponds to a known large hiatal hernia.
Impression: Unchanged large hiatal hernia. No focal consolidation.
